title: [Medicine] Researchers for the first time found connection between household chemicals and gut microbiome. Children with higher levels of PFASs (in paint and cleaning products) had reduced amount and diversity of bacteria, while increased levels of phthalates (in detergents) were associated with reduced fungi.
[Medicine] Profile of circulating microRNAs in myalgic encephalomyelitis and their relation to symptom severity, and disease pathophysiology
